org.eclipse.kura.message

Class KuraTopic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.kura.message.KuraTopic

  • public class KuraTopic
extends Object
    Models a topic for messages posted to the Kura platform. Topic are expected to be in the form of "account/asset/"; system topic starts with the $EDC account.
